lines.speaker: npc
lines.text: Hello! Let me tell you about seaweed!

lines.speaker: npc
lines.label: seaweedStart
lines.text: Seaweed is a cool type of organism that isn't technically a plant! Seaweed is a macroalgae, featuring different types of growth patterns and techniques. Despite what you'd think, it doesn't have roots and doesn't pull any nutrients from underwater soil where it's anchored. Instead, the "roots" - or holdfasts as they're called - are actually just for anchoring the seaweed.

options.text: That's cool! Can you tell me another cool seaweed fact?
Oh, very intersting! Unfortunately, I left the oven on so I need to go.

lines.speaker: npc
lines.label: repeat
lines.text: Sure! Another cool thing is that seaweed can emit some serious acid, string enough to burn through rocks to get a hold! And those floating seaweed? Those floating bits are actually full of nasty non-air gasses, believe it or not. Plus, it's so sinky because it breaks down into hydrogen sulfilde. Smells like rotten eggs a bit - potent stuff!

lines.speaker: player

options.text: Hmm, I didn't quite catch that last part, can you repeat it?

lines.notes: The player gets to choose this one, this can loop forever
